issue.title: [Java] Improve the performance of DictionaryHashTable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6335](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6335). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
when comparing two entries in the dictionary hash table, it is more efficient to compare the index directly, rather than using Objects.equals, because they are both ints.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6335?focusedCommentId=16915461) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5178
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5178>
